sqlMap.select: SELECT supply_id "Supply ID", stg.type_name "Type Name", item_name "Item Name", item_unit "Item Unit", obsolete_tag "Obsolete Tag", location "Location", reorder_level "Reorder Level", actual_count "Actual Count", remarks "Remarks", date_added "Date Added", sg.last_user "Last User", sg.last_update "Last Update" FROM SUPPLIES_GROUP2 sg, SUPPLY_TYPES_GROUP2 stg WHERE sg.supply_type_id = stg.supply_type_id ORDER BY supply_id

SELECT supply_id "Supply ID", stg.type_name "Type Name", item_name "Item Name", item_unit "Item Unit", obsolete_tag "Obsolete Tag", location "Location", reorder_level "Reorder Level", actual_count "Actual Count", remarks "Remarks", date_added "Date Added", sg.last_user "Last User", sg.last_update "Last Update" FROM SUPPLIES_GROUP2 sg, SUPPLY_TYPES_GROUP2 stg WHERE sg.supply_type_id = stg.supply_type_id AND UPPER(item_name) LIKE UPPER('%'||#txtSearch#||'%') ORDER BY supply_id
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SUPPLIES_GROUP2 (supply_id, supply_type_id, item_name, item_unit, obsolete_tag, location, reorder_level, actual_count, remarks, date_added, last_user, last_update) VALUES (seq_supplies_group2.NEXTVAL, (SELECT supply_type_id FROM SUPPLY_TYPES_GROUP2 WHERE type_name = #typeName#), #itemName#, #itemUnit#, #obsoleteTag#, #location#, #reorderLevel#, #actualCount#, #remarks#, SYSDATE, #lastUser#, SYSDATE)

UPDATE SUPPLIES_GROUP2 SET supply_type_id = (SELECT supply_type_id FROM SUPPLY_TYPES_GROUP2 WHERE type_name = #typeName#), item_name = #itemName#, item_unit = #itemUnit#, obsolete_tag = #obsoleteTag#, location = #location#, reorder_level = #reorderLevel#, remarks = #remarks#, last_user = #lastUser#, last_update = SYSDATE WHERE supply_id = #supplyID#
sqlMap.select: SELECT i.issued_id issued_id, s.supply_id supply_id, i.quantity quantity, s.reorder_level reorder_level, TO_CHAR(issue_date,'dd-MON-yy') issue_date, item_name, requestor, dept_id, d.department_name department_name, i.last_user last_user, TO_CHAR(i.last_update,'dd-MON-yy') last_update FROM issued_supplies_group2 i, supplies_group2 s, departments d WHERE i.supply_id = s.supply_id AND d.department_id = i.dept_id ORDER BY i.issued_id ASC

SELECT i.issued_id issued_id, s.supply_id supply_id, i.quantity quantity, s.reorder_level reorder_level, TO_CHAR(issue_date,'dd-MON-yy') issue_date, item_name, requestor, dept_id, d.department_name department_name, i.last_user last_user, TO_CHAR(i.last_update,'dd-MON-yy') last_update FROM issued_supplies_group2 i, supplies_group2 s, departments d WHERE i.supply_id = s.supply_id AND d.department_id = i.dept_id AND (i.issued_id LIKE '%'||#search#||'%' OR LOWER(item_name) LIKE '%'||LOWER(#search#)||'%')
SELECT item_name FROM supplies_group2 WHERE LOWER(obsolete_tag) != 'y'
SELECT item_name, supply_id, obsolete_tag, actual_count, reorder_level, last_user, TO_DATE(last_update, 'dd-MON-yyyy') last_update FROM supplies_group2
